titleStmt.title: Tal Ilan Lexicon, Master List -- Judah-יהודה

state.note: Judah (82) and Joseph (90)’s father, Phaidrus (1)’s son
Priest, Joseph (131)’s son, of Hezir family
Quiriacus (1), Simon (1) and Hannah (1)’s son, discoverer of the cross, bishop of Jerusalem

person.bibl: 1.POiv/3, 270; 2. Guidi,ROC1/9 (1904) 87; 3. Gregory of Tour,PL71, 179; 4. Pseudo-Cyril of Jerusalem,The Cross, 30b 2; 5. Krauss,Leben Jesu, 142

state.note: Marcus (2) Aurelius (4) Pylades (1)’s father, of Scythopolis
Inscription, cave west of Jerusalem, Ben-Zevi
